## Profiling
### Memo
```{r}
Rprof("path_to_hold_output")
## some code to be profiled
Rprof(NULL)
## some code NOT to be profiled
Rprof("path_to_hold_output", append=TRUE)
## some code to be profiled
Rprof(NULL)
 
# summarize the results
summaryRprof("path_to_hold_output")
```
